message:
SYSTEM: 2.RDF%28S%29.pdf: Página 19
• 19 
RDF Reification 
•  RDF statements about other RDF statements 
•  “Raúl believes that Oscar’s birthdate is on Feb 2nd, 1976 and 
that his e-mail address is ocorcho@fi.upm.es” 
•  Expressed using rdf:Statement, rdf:subject, 
rdf:predicate, and rdf:object 
•  RDF Reification 
•  Allows expressing beliefs (and other modalities) 
•  Allows expressing trust models, digital signatures, etc. 
•  Allows expressing metadata about metadata 
37 
people:Raul 
people:Oscar 
modal:believes 
“ocorcho@fi.upm.es” 
properties:hasEmailAddress 
“1976-02-02”^^xsd:date 
properties:hasBirthDate 
Main value of a structured value 
•  Sometimes one of the values of a structured value is 
the main one 
•  The weight of an item is 2.4 kilograms  
•  The main value is 2.4, which is expressed with rdf:value 
•  Scarcely used 
38 
product:Item1 
      
product:hasWeight 
“2.4”^^xsd:float 
rdf:value 
units:Kilogram 
units:hasWeightUnit
speaker: SYSTEM
